title: Unable to Open 2nd Premium Chest

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: As you can see in the screenshot, the open button for my 2nd FREE premium chest is grayed-out, and I cannot open the chest. I opened my first crate fine, hence why I got a Kassadin skin (which I upgraded to permanent) and a ward skin, but I can't open the 2nd one.

replies.body: go play on your normal account and stop smurfing that might help.

From the screenshot, it doesn't look like you currently have any keys at the moment which might be why you haven't been able to open it. I just tested this myself, and without having any keys I'm not able to open it either. I'm going to reach out to see if this is working as intended or not, but in the meantime, let me know if you're able to open that chest once you have a key.
I have multiple accounts, so I know that you get 2 FREE chests when you hit level 5, and this chest is one of them. (The 2nd one to be exact, the one where you get a Garen and Ashe shard)
